product_name: Spy Targa Mini Snow Goggles - Girls'
long_description: Boasting the same features found in adult models, the girls' Spy Targa Mini snow goggles deliver clear optics and a comfortable fit for your little grom's days on the mountain. Bronze lens has a blue tint with 24% visible light transmission (VLT) for good all-around performance in changing light conditions. Cylindrical lens is designed to deliver wide peripheral vision; minimalist frame helps expand the viewable area. Double-layer thermal lens creates a thermal barrier between the cold outside air and the warm air next to the face, helping reduce fogging. Antifog and antiscratch lens treatments help keep vision clear and distortion-free. Strategically placed frame vents increase airflow to reduce fogging; flexible polyurethane frame ensures a comfortable fit. Dual-layer foam with moisture-wicking fleece supplies a comfortable, snug seal around the face. The wide adjustable strap of the girls' Spy Targa Mini snow goggles is backed with silicone ribbing so it stays in place.
